Members Chapter Previous Next

class CGOBStaticPic : public CGOBWidget

StaticPic is a simple widget similar to CGOBStaticText but handles an image instead of text.

The image is in the base class, so this class simply handles drawing it. This class is almost not needed since animation can be handled with AnimObj and the image is in the base class.

This class could be removed but allows for customization in the future.

#include "GOBStaticPic.h"
